0.1.name: wordpress/customizable-captcha-and-contact-us-form
0.1.description:
Description: Plugin to add captcha to core wordpress forms and additional option for contact us page.Just need to insert the code [cccontact] in a page where you want to show contact us form.

Thanks for downloading and installing my plugin. You can show your appreciation and support future development by donating.

For more visit: http://www.outsource-online.net/osolmulticaptcha-simplest-php-captcha-for-html-forms.html
